title: ahri is vastayan right? so...does that mean..
body:
That theres a tribe of fox people?????

I think old lore was she was a fox, became human due to magic in the forest?? Has to eat human souls. Kinda an individual thing.

Now shes just vastayan by like..race? 

Gimme sexi fox man. A hot tanned fox tail version of Kayn.

I love ahri and all, but im torn between wanting to be with her or be her.

So fox man, pls.

replies.body:
Namimaki! Ahri is the only member of her tribe that _she_ knows of, since she was abandoned at birth, but she's on a quest to find her family. From her bio:

> With the twin gemstones as the only clue to her origin, Ahri set out in search of others like her. No more would she rely on borrowed memories and unfamiliar dreams.

And in the story "[A Fair Trade](https://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/story/ahri-color/)," maybe she continues to unravel her past... or maybe she doesn't. I don't want to give any spoilers. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} 

We won't know more about the tribe until Ahri learns it herself, it seems... so your question has no answer, or any answer you'd like to give it. Depending on your point of view. :D

I hope Jellbug gets a chance to write more Ahri stories soon!

> [{quoted}](name=Interlocutioner,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=MhIyJKhI,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2017-12-18T23:46:00.143+0000)
>
> Namimaki! Ahri is the only member of her tribe that _she_ knows of, since she was abandoned at birth, but she's on a quest to find her family. From her bio:
> 
> And in the story "[A Fair Trade](https://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/story/ahri-color/)," maybe she continues to unravel her past... or maybe she doesn't. I don't want to give any spoilers. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} 
> 
> We won't know more about the tribe until Ahri learns it herself, it seems... so your question has no answer, or any answer you'd like to give it. Depending on your point of view. :D
> 
> I hope Jellbug gets a chance to write more Ahri stories soon!

Thank you for replying , considering my post is really silly. 

Please grace us with a beautiful fox  or wolf vastayan man, or at least put a word in for me <3

I hope Ionian/Vastayan champions lore is expanded upon!
or any mostly humanoid hot vastayan whos not rakan. someone said wolf archer vastayan.

I'm more interested in the tribes of Makara and Raylu.
http://i.imgur.com/Hu4nsLP.jpg

Eversmiling, carnivorous crustacean?
Sounds badass!

And Raylu (because of that name and being a water related tribe) sounds like they have ray features. Rays are beautiful creatures and such a champ could be highly interesting.

ya  so anyway, i want fox guy
This thread made me lmao, pls continue hooman!
I'm on board.
She is a Vatasya fox ( in the lore they said she is a women with fox like trait like ears and tails . They also mention that she live with a pack of " ice foxes").

She is a vastaya and there should be more fox vastaya like her.
However we don't know their wherabouts or if they still exist.

It's actually possible that they were wiped out by now.

I think she's the only and legendary nine-tailed fox because literally it says Ahri the Nine-Tailed fox and "the" is enough of showing that she is unique. There might be other fox-human vastayans but none should be the nine-tailed fox except Ahri..

{{sticker:sg-ahri-3}}

Exactly, for Ahri it didn't say something like The Ionian Seductress or something so that she is lika a nine-tailed fox but there's many other nine-tailed foxes.. nope, it says The Nine-Tailed Fox which means it's her own unique theme and should be only hers 

{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}

Not until I get an angel man torn between Morgana and Kayle.

Make ahri fall in love with a kind but mangy dog vastayan female. why not eh?
From all of the hackneyed official lore I've seen since the reboot, she seems to be alone.  IDK, I think it's terrible.
Bleeding furries, get out of my game!
